hero.headline: Building governed AI systems within real constraints
hero.subheadline: I design decision support systems, data validation pipelines, and operational tooling—focused on what survives contact with compliance teams, legacy infrastructure, and actual humans.

proofSignals: Built data ingestion pipelines that enforce authority rules before AI sees anything
Shipped AI-enabled systems used in production contexts with compliance constraints
Designed weekly decision support delivered via email—not another dashboard
Work with non-technical stakeholders to translate 'AI-first' into operational reality
designPrinciples: Authority before intelligence — Data quality gates before AI features
Governance as architecture, not afterthought — Compliance baked into system design
Cognitive load is a design constraint — Simplicity over feature completeness
Transparent reasoning over black-box accuracy — Explainability is non-negotiable
Email-first when possible — Reduce platform sprawl
Non-technical stakeholders are primary users — Technical elegance serves operational clarity

about.experience: 3+ years building AI-enabled systems for organizations that prioritize reliability over speed
about.focus: Focus areas: data authority, decision support, agent-assisted workflows
